title: European Film Academy - Wikipedia
snippet: In 1990, the organization was renamed the European Film Academy and registered as a non-profit association. In 1996, Wim Wenders succeeded Bergman as president, and Nik Powell, a British producer, was elected chairman. Mike Downey, an Irish-British film producer, was elected chairman in 2020.

title: Romanian producer Ada Solomon elected chair of the European Film Academy board | Romania Insider
snippet: Producer Ada Solomon has been elected chair of the board of the European Film Academy, marking the highest level of representation the Romanian film industry has achieved within the institution.
